topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: Mailafar
short_description: Mailafar is a mail server designed for use in difficult communication environments providing a full set of Internet email protocols, web mail, web admin, dial-in and wireless LAN access control. It will run on Linux, FreeBSD and Windows.
